code: import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Disclaimer=_ref=>{let{disclaimer,setDisclaimer}=_ref;const handleOptionChange=index=>{if(index===-1){setDisclaimer(disclaimer.map(()=>false));}else{const updatedDisclaimer=disclaimer.map((item,idx)=>idx===index?!item:item);setDisclaimer(updatedDisclaimer);}};const isNoDisclaimerSelected=disclaimer.every(item=>!item);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"disclaimer-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"input-label",children:"Disclaimer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"disclaimer-options",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",value:"No Disclaimer",checked:isNoDisclaimerSelected,onChange:()=>handleOptionChange(-1)}),"No Disclaimer"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",value:"Disclaimer 1",checked:disclaimer[0],onChange:()=>handleOptionChange(0)}),"For coordination only"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",value:"Disclaimer 2",checked:disclaimer[1],onChange:()=>handleOptionChange(1)}),"Issued for tender"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",value:"Disclaimer 3",checked:disclaimer[2],onChange:()=>handleOptionChange(2)}),"Disclaimer Option 3"]})]})]});};export default Disclaimer;
